Name: Paint Scarf
LongDescription: Makes it easier to find Hidden Stairs in dungeons. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Smeargle.  Finding a Paint Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
